name: Standard page
description: Standard page has a one column layout, a two blocks and Hero, and a 4 blocks and Hero layout which include multiple sections for greater flexibility.  In the Oslo site, it's used for the Home, Events, and About us pages.

elements.label: Banner section
elements.helpText: Add content, such as a hero banner, that you want to display at the top of your page.

elements.label: Section two
elements.helpText: Add more related body content, lists, or images.
